initialize_harness.notes: System boots: PostgreSQL, migrations, seed data, API, and Vite frontend all working. Pre-existing test failures in TimelineCard.test.tsx noted.

claims_intake_flow.notes: POST /api/cases endpoint with Zod validation, ClaimsIntakeModal frontend component, integrated into dashboard with New Claim button. 6 unit tests added.

certificate_ingestion_engine.notes: Certificate CRUD API, upload endpoint with OCR extraction, expiry alerts, webhook ingestion. 6 unit tests for service layer.

medical_flags_and_red_risk.notes: Clinical evidence evaluation with severity-based flags (high_risk, warning, info). GET /api/gpnet2/red-flags endpoint. Duty safety status. RiskBadge component. 15 unit tests.

return_to_work_planner.notes: RTW plan API (GET/PATCH /api/cases/:caseId/rtw-plan) with 7 status states per PRD-3.2.3. State transitions, audit logging, summary stats endpoint. 21 unit tests for schema validation and status transitions.
